name: Ru in the Woods
description:
My first project in Godot, made for MMST-142: Game Development 1

All source code and a thousand unused sprites are available on GitHub: https://github.com/slinkous/ruWoods

Palette is the LoSpec-500 palette collaboration: https://lospec.com/palette-list/lospec500

Music is "Nothing Will Grow Here" by Komiku: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku

Special thanks to HeartBeast for the Godot Action RPG Series:
